Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments
Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.C Office of Victoria Wagner - editorial and publicity departments

Press releases, with some correspondence and lists of recipients. Releases typically publicize student activities, events (such as guest speakers), new hires, student community service and programs, performances and exhibitions, sporting events, collaborations with other institutions, and publications.
